jira_input.epic_description: Czech banking requirement for consolidating questionnaire administration applications
comments: Please provide complete project definition analysis using the full lifecycle workflow for this banking questionnaire consolidation system

parsed_content.input_data: Comprehensive Czech banking requirement for replacing multiple questionnaire applications (AML, KYC, investment questionnaire) with a unified system. Includes business objectives, stakeholder perspectives, and scope definition.
parsed_content.user_instructions: Execute complete project definition workflow (all phases 1-11) and generate Czech analytical documents
parsed_content.stakeholder_info: Investment Center, Banking Center, Compliance (Tomáš Jedno)
parsed_content.requirements_summary: Consolidate questionnaire administration, eliminate duplications, improve client experience, maintain existing evaluation algorithms

routing_logic.decision_rationale: User explicitly requested complete project definition analysis using full lifecycle workflow. Input contains comprehensive business requirements covering all aspects needed for complete project definition.

deliverables: Complete project definition with all 11 phases
consolidated_outputs.stakeholder_summary: All stakeholders (Investment Center, Banking Center, Compliance) have formally approved the project. Executive sponsorship from CIO secured. IT Steering Committee and Finance Committee approvals obtained. Project authorized for implementation with €2.5M budget and 06/25 deadline.
